ModMetaData.name: Minerals Framework
ModMetaData.author: Zachary S. L. Foster
ModMetaData.description:
An overhaul of anything mineable and the foundation for the "Minerals" collection of mods. Includes:
- Realistic organic mineral appearances with varied sizes and textures - Dynamic mineral growth/shrinking based on environmental conditions - Mining yields affected by miner skill and mineral size - Gradual resource drops during mining instead of instant drops - Snow accumulation effects on textures - Customizable mining products with probabilities/quantities
Compatible with most mods. Part of the Minerals collection: - Minerals Rock, Minerals Sparkle, Minerals Craft - Minerals Exotic, Minerals Frozen, and more
